title: PAYDAY.2.v1.9.3.Incl.All.DLC-REVOLT
description:
REVOLT  P R E S E N T S          
     

PAYDAY.2.v1.9.3.Incl.All.DLC-REVOLT  
        PROTECTiON ................: Steam                   
                 SiZE ......................: 7.00 GB                     
                    TYPE ......................: Full Game                      
                        REQUIRES ..................: Steam Client                  
                                                                               
                                                                               
    
  GAME iNFO    
                                                          
   GENERAL                                                              
                                                       
                                                                             
    Title: PAYDAY 2                                                          
    Genre: Action, RPG                                                       
    Developer: OVERKILL                                                      
    Publisher: 505 Games                                                     
    Release Date: Aug 2013                                                   
    Languages: English*,German,French,Italian,Spanish                        
    *languages with full audio support                                       
                                                                             
                                                    
   MODES                                                               
                                                    
                                                                             
    Single-player                                                            
    Co-op                                                                    
                                                                             
                                                     
  ABOUT                                                                
                                           
                                                                             
    PAYDAY 2 is an action-packed, four-player co-op shooter that once again  
    lets gamers don the maska of the original PAYDAY crew - Dallas,          
    Hoxton, Wolf and Chains - as they descend on Washington DC for an epic   
    crime spree.                                                             
                                                                             
                                                                             
  
  RELEASE NOTES         
  
  OTHER                                                  
    Change your Steam Download Region to "UK - London", in order        
        to establish a better connection to players online.                 
                                                                            
    You can only connect to cracked lobbies!                            
                                                                           
    Saves are now stored in "save"                          
                                                                           
    Change your language using our Language selector.                   
                                                                            
    We recommend removing all earlier game files as the game has        
         changed it's entire file structure and old files could cause issues. 
                                                                             
 
  INSTRUCTIONS                                                  
                                                                            
    1. Mount the ISO and Install the setup.                               
    2. Copy the steamworks fix from REVOLT dir on the ISO to you game dir.
    3. Start Steam and login with your (fake) account.                    
    4. Start the game via payday2_win32_release.exe (as administrator).   
    5. When you're in-game, go to Crime.net:                              
    HOST: Choose a heist and Create a game.                          
    CLIENT: Host's game should be visible in Crime.net.              
    6. Play & Enjoy!
